price: 81. Y (Al-lah) os muestra las pruebas de Su unicidad. ¿Cuáles de suspruebas son las que negáis?
arabic: وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ فَأَيَّ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُنكِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wayurīkum āyātihi fa-ayya āyāti al-lahi tunkirūna
